programme.title: SEAL Team
Mornarički specijalci
programme.desc: SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr., A.J. Buckley. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sm1424"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best military show to date","reviewBody":"For the life me, I can't understand how anyone can compare this show to "Six" or "the Brave". Absolutely no comparison. This is the most realistic show about a SF unit that I have seen. Though not without it's technical imperfections, the interaction , dedication, and brotherhood between these men is the most realistic I've seen depicted in a television series. The casual wise cracks, character interaction, and frequent jokes made to diffuse the stress of the mission, deployments and balancing family/personal life, is greatly portrayed. Bravo from a 26-year vet.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18787,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"u.s. military,military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112932/","name":"Neil Brown Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Shield
programme.desc: Michael Chicklis glumi okorjelog policajca, detektiva Vica Mackeyja, vođu elitne postrojbe "Udarni tim" koja uspješno hvata kriminalce, ali prema vlastitim metodama. Okorjeli policajac, detektiv Vic Mackey, vođa je elitne postrojbe "Udarni tim" koja uspješno hvata kriminalce, ali prema vlastitim metodama. Kapetan David Aceveda, mladi je šef policijske postaje, koji ne voli Mackyjev način rada i nastoji ga izbaciti iz službe. Claudette je stara detektivka i Mackeyjeva taktika nije joj strana, pa uspješno igra na obje strane.

Kapetan David Aceveda, mladi je šef policijske postaje, koji ne voli Mackyjev način rada i nastoji ga izbaciti iz službe. Claudette je stara detektivka i Mackeyjeva taktika nije joj strana, pa uspješno igra na obje strane.

credits.actor: Jordana Spiro, William Forsythe, James Carpinello, Zach Gilford, Zeljko Ivanek, Floriana Lima, Jaime Lee Kirchner, Wendy Makkena
Jordana Spiro, William Forsythe, James Carpinello, Zach Gilford, Zeljko Ivanek, Floriana Lima, Jaime Lee Kirchner, Wendy Makkena

programme.title: Testna vožnja
programme.desc: Vodimo vas u potragu za starim i novim automobilima i ljudima koji ih renoviraju. Auti koje ćemo vam predstaviti bit će testirani od strane vozača Formule 1, Mike Salona. Vodimo vas u potragu za starim i novim automobilima i ljudima koji ih renoviraju. Auti koje ćemo vam predstaviti bit će testirani od strane vozača Formule 1, Mike Salona. U svakoj epizodi Salon će nam reći nešto više o obnovljenim modelima.

programme.title: Profileri
programme.desc: Francuska serija pod nazivom "Profileri" predstavlja Chloé, kriminalističku psihologinju koja istražuje ubojice kako bi pomogla riješiti slučajeve zločina. Chloé Saint-Laurent je profiler i radi s policijskim timom za rješavanje ubojstva u Parizu. Ona je vrlo draga, nosi jako obojenu odjeću i veliku žutu torbu. Izgleda poput djevojčice koja treba lutku, ali je vrlo pametna i jako dobar profiler. Korak po korak, uklopit će se u tim a njezine kolege, u početku jako pridržane, postaju joj najbolji prijatelji.

It is one of the most-engaging legal mini-series ever produced. Reminiscent of the intensity of the 1960s series The Defenders.

A lawyer is sent to a small Canadian town to resolve claims a client's drug might be causing local girls to get sick. That starts her on a quest to find the cause of the illness. 

Great script and top-notch acting by Kristin Kreuk and Peter Mooney in the lead roles.

Intrigue. Romance. Danger. Sleazy lawyers. Corrupt police and politicians. Family feuding and secrets. programme.desc: SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr., A.J. Buckley. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sm1424"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best military show to date","reviewBody":"For the life me, I can't understand how anyone can compare this show to "Six" or "the Brave". Absolutely no comparison. This is the most realistic show about a SF unit that I have seen. Though not without it's technical imperfections, the interaction , dedication, and brotherhood between these men is the most realistic I've seen depicted in a television series. The casual wise cracks, character interaction, and frequent jokes made to diffuse the stress of the mission, deployments and balancing family/personal life, is greatly portrayed. Bravo from a 26-year vet.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18787,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"u.s. military,military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112932/","name":"Neil Brown Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."}}</script><metacontent="

Big city lawyer Joanna Hanley returns to her hometown to take the case of a group of girls suffering from a mysterious illness." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6987476/","name":"Burden of Truth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWNiNTEyZmYtODIzMy00NmEzLTk4MmYtYTg4ZTc0MzJiOTRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjYzNDE4ODA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Big city lawyer Joanna Hanley returns to her hometown to take the case of a group of girls suffering from a mysterious illness.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6987476/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"contact-562-20249"},"dateCreated":"2018-08-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"First-class legal thriller mini-series","reviewBody":"Burden of Truth is a first-class legal thriller mini-series. It is one of the most-engaging legal mini-series ever produced. Reminiscent of the intensity of the 1960s series The Defenders.

A lawyer is sent to a small Canadian town to resolve claims a client's drug might be causing local girls to get sick. That starts her on a quest to find the cause of the illness. 

Great script and top-notch acting by Kristin Kreuk and Peter Mooney in the lead roles.

Intrigue. Romance. Danger. Sleazy lawyers. Corrupt police and politicians. Family feuding and secrets. programme.desc: SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr., A.J. Buckley. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sm1424"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best military show to date","reviewBody":"For the life me, I can't understand how anyone can compare this show to "Six" or "the Brave". Absolutely no comparison. This is the most realistic show about a SF unit that I have seen. Though not without it's technical imperfections, the interaction , dedication, and brotherhood between these men is the most realistic I've seen depicted in a television series. The casual wise cracks, character interaction, and frequent jokes made to diffuse the stress of the mission, deployments and balancing family/personal life, is greatly portrayed. Bravo from a 26-year vet.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18787,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"u.s. military,military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112932/","name":"Neil Brown Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Navy CIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Svaki član NCIS-a mora preuzeti odgovornost za posljedice svojih postupaka, počevši od Pridea. Loretta se uključuje u predizbornu kampanju. Kriminalistička serija pod nazivom Navy CSI New Orleans prikazuje tim specijalnih agenata koji istražuju slučajeve vezane uz vojno osoblje New Orleansa. Vođa tima agenata jest pravedni i hrabri Dwayne koji strastveno riješava svaki zadatak koji mu je dodijeljen.

programme.title: Navy CIS
programme.desc: Tim Navy CIS-a istražuje ubojitu eksploziju automobila u Washingtonu koja je povezana s NCIS-ovim specijalnim agentom Nicholasom "Nickom" Torresom (Wilmer Valderrama), a koji je nestao prije šest... Tim Navy CIS-a istražuje ubojitu eksploziju automobila u Washingtonu koja je povezana s NCIS-ovim specijalnim agentom Nicholasom "Nickom" Torresom (Wilmer Valderrama), a koji je nestao prije šest mjeseci dok je bio na tajnom zadatku u Argentini. Također, Gibbs moli NCIS-ovu specijalnu agenticu Alexandru "Alex" Quinn (Jennifer Esposito) da potajice prati njegovu ekipu nakon što je odbio osam agenata koje je ona obučavala i preporučila ih za otvoreno radno mjesto.

programme.title: Navy CIS
programme.desc: Tijekom istrage smrtnog slučaja za vrijeme godišnjice diplome u Quanticu, Navy CIS otkriva bombašku zavjeru i mrežu lopova koja već dugo djeluje. Uz to, Torres i Quinn privikavaju se na život u... Tijekom istrage smrtnog slučaja za vrijeme godišnjice diplome u Quanticu, Navy CIS otkriva bombašku zavjeru i mrežu lopova koja već dugo djeluje. Uz to, Torres i Quinn privikavaju se na život u Gibbsovoj ekipi što uključuje i novi raspored sjedenja u prostoriji.

programme.title: Metoroporisu
Metropolis
programme.desc:
Metoroporisu: Directed by Rintaro. With Yuka Imoto, Kei Kobayashi, Kôki Okada, Tarô Ishida. Kenichi and his uncle Shunsaku Ban must find the mystery behind robot girl Tima." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0293416/","name":"Metoroporisu","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWRkOGM0N2UtMTIyZi00MjA4LTg0NjQtN2RkYTQwMGJlNzFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDYzNTI2ODc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Kenichi and his uncle Shunsaku Ban must find the mystery behind robot girl Tima.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0293416/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Tweekums"},"dateCreated":"2009-10-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"A great retro sci-fi","reviewBody":"I knew little about this film but when I saw that it was going to be on television I decided to watch it; there is so little non-Ghibli anime on TV one has to take what one can get. When it started I knew this was going to be different; most of the characters didn't look like anime characters, they looked more like characters from western cartoons of the 1930s. This fitted in with the feel of the whole film which was a 1920s/1930s view of the future reminiscent of Fritz Lang's film of the same name.

Set in the city state of Metropolis where the robot underclass must stay in their designated areas and a scientist is building a robot that looks like a girl but is destined to run a new skyscraper known as the Ziggurat. Into this city comes a Japanese private detective and his nephew Kenichi who are seeking to arrest the scientist for organ trafficking. The state's de facto leader Duke Red's adopted son Rock is determined to destroy the robot thinking his father is replacing him. Rock starts a fire in the lab. During this the robot is activated and escapes with Kenichi although neither know that she isn't human. Rock continues to hunt them as the flee through the various layers of the city to a climax in the mysterious Ziggurat.

I loved the retro feel to the animation along with a sound track that also felt like it was from that time. The use of the song "I Can't Stop Loving You" during the climactic scene was inspired. Even if you don't normally like animation this is worth watching as it is a good story which is well told.

These comments are based on watching the film in Japanese with English subtitles.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20822,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Animation","Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"2001-05-26","keywords":"robot,synthetic human,city,future,based on comic book","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Metropolis","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3878271001","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWE4NDAxYjEtNWRkMi00Y2ZhLTk5ZWQtMmFkODI5NmFlYjI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWE4NDAxYjEtNWRkMi00Y2ZhLTk5ZWQtMmFkODI5NmFlYjI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Metropolis"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0299192/","name":"Toshio Furukawa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0918334/","name":"Scott Weinger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131157/","name":"Yuka Imoto"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0727336/","name":"Rintaro"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0080697/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0064941/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0195909/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0856804/","name":"Osamu Tezuka"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0960028/","name":"Katsuhiro Ôtomo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0359584/","name":"Marc Handler"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ultraviolet
Ultraviolet
programme.desc: Ultraviolet: Created by Wendy West. With Viet Anh Do, Marta Nieradkiewicz, Bartlomiej Topa, Magdalena Czerwinska. An online community of amateur sleuths use technology to solve crimes -- and make quirky friends -- in their quest for justice." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7514746/","name":"Ultraviolet","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjBhOGQyYmMtZTNhOS00MGRlLTljNTAtNDQ0ZGI5N2RjMWMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEwMTY3NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"An online community of amateur sleuths use technology to solve crimes -- and make quirky friends -- in their quest for justice.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7514746/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sdskate-66437"},"dateCreated":"2018-10-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great addition to crime drama series!!!","reviewBody":"I have to admit, I enjoy foreign crime series much better than American crime series. In my experience, in other countries the main characters are more developed, made to be experienced as more human and end up more likable than American crime drama series main characters. Ultraviolet is the first Polish tv series I have watched and, not only does it not disappoint, it has a refreshing POV on crime solving by using the amateur Internet sleuths. I LOVED IT!!! I sure hope Netflix offers us the 2nd season, and more!!!!!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1479,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime"],"datePublished":"2017-10-25","keywords":"technology","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9426329/","name":"Viet Anh Do"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2203849/","name":"Marta Nieradkiewicz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0867603/","name":"Bartlomiej Topa"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0668353/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0506795/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0185099/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0922388/","name":"Wendy West"}]}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ultraviolet
programme.desc: Serija pod nazivom "Ultraviolet" prati život tridesetogodišnje Ole Serafin koja napušta grad u kojem živi u supruga kako bi se vratila u rodni grad gdje je svjedočila sumnjivom događaju... Kriminalistička, televizijska serija pod nazivom "Ultraviolet" donosi priču o tridesetogodišnjoj ženi Oli Serafin koja se iz Londona treba vratiti u svoj rodni grad Łódź. Jedne večeri, svjedoči jednom sumnjivom događaju koji izgleda kao pokušaj samoubojstva. Pokušava pronaći pomoć preko interneta prilikom čega nailazi na skupinu detektiva amatera koji se bave slučajevima koje policija ne rješava.

programme.title: Novak
programme.desc: Nekoliko dana prije ispita Bradford i Lopez otkriju da Lucy i Jackson nisu svjedočili svim vrstama zločina, za što im je još ostalo 48 sati. Nolanu nije dodijeljen zadatak na terenu pa ostaje u uredu,... Nekoliko dana prije ispita Bradford i Lopez otkriju da Lucy i Jackson nisu svjedočili svim vrstama zločina, za što im je još ostalo 48 sati. Nolanu nije dodijeljen zadatak na terenu pa ostaje u uredu, dok Talia odgovara pred Unutarnjom kontrolom. Nolan ipak odlučuje pridružiti se Wolfeu. Na ulici Jackson i Lucy nalaze Bena, posljednju žrtvu organiziranih kradljivaca vozila. Na kraju Nolan pomaže uloviti kradljivce, a kasnije stane u obranu Talije pred Unutarnjom kontrolom.

credits.actor: Nathan Fillion, Alyssa Diaz, Richard T. Jones, Titus Makin Jr., Melissa O'Neil, Afton Williamson, Eric Winter, Sarah Shahi

programme.title: Novak
programme.desc: I dok se Bradforda žurno vozi u bolnicu, treći terorist dočekuje policiju u zasjedi. Nolan i Bredford, koji je imao samo alergijsku reakciju na primljene lijekove, obračunaju se s teroristom. Dva... I dok se Bradforda žurno vozi u bolnicu, treći terorist dočekuje policiju u zasjedi. Nolan i Bredford, koji je imao samo alergijsku reakciju na primljene lijekove, obračunaju se s teroristom. Dva tjedna kasnije, Nolan je u svom novom domu, dok novaci primaju rezultate položenih ispita. Svi su prošli, no West je sumnjičav prema rezutatima. Nakon što su Nolan i Grey svjedočili pljački u trgovini policijske uniforme tim doznaje za plan koji uključuje lažno uniformirane policajce. Kasnije pronalaze jednog od pljačkaša mrtvog nakon što su ga partneri ubili i zapalili njegovo tijelo.

credits.actor: Nathan Fillion, Alyssa Diaz, Richard T. Jones, Titus Makin Jr., Melissa O'Neil, Eric Winter, Harold Perrineau, Taylor Nichols

programme.title: Ultraviolet
programme.desc: Serija pod nazivom "Ultraviolet" prati život tridesetogodišnje Ole Serafin koja napušta grad u kojem živi u supruga kako bi se vratila u rodni grad gdje je svjedočila sumnjivom događaju... Kriminalistička, televizijska serija pod nazivom "Ultraviolet" donosi priču o tridesetogodišnjoj ženi Oli Serafin koja se iz Londona treba vratiti u svoj rodni grad Łódź. Jedne večeri, svjedoči jednom sumnjivom događaju koji izgleda kao pokušaj samoubojstva. Pokušava pronaći pomoć preko interneta prilikom čega nailazi na skupinu detektiva amatera koji se bave slučajevima koje policija ne rješava.

West je dodijeljen policajcu Smittyju na jedan dan. Smitty je jako opušten što Westa silno živicira. Kasnije, zločinac kojeg West hvata baca pištolj u obližnje dvorište. Dječak, vjerujući da je pištolj igračka, izima ga i slučajno ubija svoju majku.

programme.title: St. Vincent
St. Vincent
programme.desc:
St. Vincent: Directed by Theodore Melfi. With Bill Murray, Melissa McCarthy, Naomi Watts, Chris O'Dowd. A young boy whose parents have just divorced finds an unlikely friend and mentor in the misanthropic, bawdy, hedonistic war veteran who lives next door." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2170593/","name":"St. Vincent","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk5NzI5OTA4MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjc4NTM3MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young boy whose parents have just divorced finds an unlikely friend and mentor in the misanthropic, bawdy, hedonistic war veteran who lives next door.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2170593/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dastaten"},"dateCreated":"2014-11-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great movie with a lot of heart","reviewBody":"I don't review many movies, but after watching St. Vincent, I thought the 7.5 rating was a bit unfair and I wanted to put my two cents in.

I went into this thinking I was going to watch a comedy. I figured it was going to be like a funny version of Gran Torino. But this movie is a drama with a lot heart that also has some great humor peppered throughout. It's insane that IMDb categorizes it as a 'comedy' only. To me, this movie is first and foremost a drama. There are heart-wrenching moments, sweet moments, and funny moments, all done very well.

I love Bill Murray, but I've never thought of him as a great actor. Boy was I pleasantly surprised here. There were times when I nearly forgot I was watching Bill Murray. He absolutely nailed the role. He made me laugh, and he made me grab more than one tissue.

It's not a complicated story, and not a terribly unique story, but it's a good story. And it has plenty of great moments that will tug at your heart. If you want a heartwarming drama that will make you laugh and make you cry, you can't go wrong with St. Vincent. And you'll probably walk away with a bit more respect for Bill Murray as an actor. I know I did. I highly recommend St. Vincent.

8.5/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":98525,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-10-24","keywords":"stroke recovery,next door neighbor,grumpy old man,divorced parents,new york city","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Exclusive Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1658236697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTEwMzA0MDk3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODk5ODIyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTEwMzA0MDk3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODk5ODIyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a trailer for St. Vincent featuring new music by Wilco's Jeff Tweedy."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000195/","name":"Bill Murray"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0565250/","name":"Melissa McCarthy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0915208/","name":"Naomi Watts"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0577647/","name":"Theodore Melfi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0286257/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0025116/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0072737/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0577647/","name":"Theodore Melfi"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Way
Put
programme.desc: The Way: Directed by Emilio Estevez. With Martin Sheen, Emilio Estevez, Deborah Kara Unger, Yorick van Wageningen. A father heads overseas to recover the body of his estranged son who died while traveling the "El camino de Santiago," and decides to take the pilgrimage himself." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1441912/","name":"The Way","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU4MzM4NzkyOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjQwNjMzNg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A father heads overseas to recover the body of his estranged son who died while traveling the "El camino de Santiago," and decides to take the pilgrimage himself.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1441912/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"wmconsidine"},"dateCreated":"2011-05-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"great piece of cinema","reviewBody":"I have looked forward to "the way" since first hearing about it. I heard interviews with Martin Sheen himself and a great double interview with Martin and Emilio on Irish radio. I did a part of the camino in 2009 and It was a life changing/enhancing experience for me so I couldn't wait to see how the film would deal with it. Yesterday I saw the film in the Screen cinema in College Green Dublin. The film is, in my opinion, very true to the camino experience. A previous reviewer trivialised it as "a road movie" and suggested "wizard of Oz" characterisation. The camino "road" has been travelled for over a thousand years. Long before "road movies" were even thought about and yes, any story of fellow travellers sharing their stories on a journey, can be similar to the "wizard of Oz" but I think Chaucers "Canterbury Tales" is probably the true origin of the species. The camino de Santiago in its reality, and in this film, is a wonderful kaleidoscopic confluence of humanity. Pilgrims seem to self-select for certain character traits such as eccentricity, other worldliness, joyfullness, adventurousness, hurt, curiosity etc. Tom's companions were all from the palette of characters I found on the camino. Tom himself was an accidental pilgrim and only at the end of the camino did he allow himself to fall in love with it like the others. Tom, the cynical skeptic, driven to put one foot in front of another as a way of dealing with the brokenness of his relationship with his son and the trauma of his sudden death, allows the distance required to allow viewers share in the journey of the Camino in a way that could not have been achieved by following four "ordinary" pilgrims, no matter how colourful. Tom was the "straight man", the foil, that allowed the full colours of all the other characters to shine through. I thought it was a brilliant piece of cinema. Ole!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":31708,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2010-11-19","keywords":"journey,father,dead son,spiritual journey,irish man","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Way: International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi923573529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA5MzkzNzk1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODU5MTEyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA5MzkzNzk1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODU5MTEyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An American father travels to France to recover the body of his estranged son who died while traveling "El camino de Santiago" from France to Santiago de Compostela (Spain). "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000640/","name":"Martin Sheen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000389/","name":"Emilio Estevez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000679/","name":"Deborah Kara Unger"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000389/","name":"Emilio Estevez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0188849/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000700/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0082095/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000389/","name":"Emilio Estevez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2098549/","name":"Jack Hitt"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
Indijski začin na francuski način
programme.desc:
The Hundred-Foot Journey: Directed by Lasse Hallström. With Helen Mirren, Om Puri, Manish Dayal, Charlotte Le Bon. The Kadam family leaves India for France where they open a restaurant directly across the road from Madame Mallory's Michelin-starred eatery." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2980648/","name":"The Hundred-Foot Journey","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3Mjg2MTE4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzcyNDMwMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Kadam family leaves India for France where they open a restaurant directly across the road from Madame Mallory's Michelin-starred eatery.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2980648/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sushant0406"},"dateCreated":"2014-08-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Simple, yet much better a tale than most films.","reviewBody":"I had not planned to watch this movie. It was just out of pure boredom that I opened my local newspaper to check for the list of movie shows in the next hour and decided to go for it. There was a show of The Hundred- Foot Journey and am I glad that I went to watch it.

The director was able to successfully depict the initial struggle of an Indian family, that has moved to France, after losing their matriarch to the fires of the local riots; their belligerent yet funny competition and subsequent truce with the owner of a local and famous restaurant right opposite theirs; and finally nurturing the talent of the Indian boy who had a gift of cooking by the very same French lady and his rise to stardom . 

The film also has a touching moment that all the people staying away from their loved ones must have felt in their lives. Actor Manish Dayal did a splendid role in that scene and gave a good performance,overall. The trio of Om Puri, Helen Mirren and Charlotte Le Bon did a splendid job and kept me laughing(Puri and Mirren to be specific) and intrigued the whole time. Not a moment of boredom. 

Charlote Le Bon is not only an ocean of talent, but, is insanely gorgeous. Looking forward to seeing her in more movies.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":79415,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-08-08","keywords":"restaurant,cooking,chef,haute cuisine,interracial romance","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3660426521","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI0NDA2NjU4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjExOTEzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI0NDA2NjU4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjExOTEzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A story centered on an Indian family who moves to France and opens a restaurant across the street from a Michelin-starred French restaurant.
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000545/","name":"Helen Mirren"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0700875/","name":"Om Puri"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2110485/","name":"Manish Dayal"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002120/","name":"Lasse Hallström"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004231/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1140275/","name":"Steven Knight"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5728000/","name":"Richard C. programme.title: We're the Millers
Obitelj Peeples
programme.desc:
We're the Millers: Directed by Rawson Marshall Thurber. With Jennifer Aniston, Jason Sudeikis, Emma Roberts, Will Poulter. A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1723121/","name":"We're the Millers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA5Njc0NDUxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjYzNzU1OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1723121/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sanjna-polamarasetty-869-692642"},"dateCreated":"2014-02-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"An actually funny comedy","reviewBody":"'We're the Millers' follows a drug dealer, a stripper, a runaway and a geek, who come together pretending to be a traditional, all American suburban family to smuggle a whole heap of drugs from Mexico into the US. Fortunately for us, Jennifer Aniston plays a stripper. With all the actors playing surprisingly likable characters, who's opposing chemistry works impeccably when put together. 

I usually find that most of the time, films that parade around claiming to be comedies, usually with one famous face to show, are often just not funny. But 'We're The Millers' was actually a good comedy; probably not in a witty sophisticated way, but it made me laugh. This film also has its emotions, in their own little unconventional ways, considering the leads were not exactly your average person. 

If I had to think of the one thing that I found extremely obnoxious, it would have to be Ed Helms. Everything about his character and his acting, was just annoying, which is probably why the ending made me quite happy. 

Worth watching if you need a no-brainer to spike your mood. And if not for the laughs, I'm sure Jennifer Aniston stripping would do the trick.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":421043,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2013-09-25","keywords":"stripper,girl in panties,wet panties,thong panties,white panties","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi544319001","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTYwMjM0NzU1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDI2ODU1OQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTYwMjM0NzU1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDI2ODU1OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0837177/","name":"Jason Sudeikis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000098/","name":"Jennifer Aniston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0731075/","name":"Emma Roberts"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1098493/","name":"Rawson Marshall Thurber"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038281/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0459878/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1462097/","name":"Bob Fisher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0264520/","name":"Steve Faber"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1890845/","name":"Sean Anders"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Konferenz der Tiere
Konferencija životinja
programme.desc: Konferenz der Tiere: Directed by Reinhard Klooss, Holger Tappe. With James Corden, Stephen Fry, Andy Serkis, Dawn French. A group of animals waiting for the annual flood they rely on for food and water discover that the humans, who have been destroying their habitats have built a dam for a leisure resort." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1620449/","name":"Konferenz der Tiere","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAwNjE2Njc1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDQ2NTk3Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of animals waiting for the annual flood they rely on for food and water discover that the humans, who have been destroying their habitats have built a dam for a leisure resort.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1620449/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"wsionynw"},"dateCreated":"2010-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Worst film I've ever seen","reviewBody":"Lazy, badly written, tripe. The plot is so insultingly stupid I wouldn't let children watch it in case it harmed their development. I took my 3 year old son to watch this and even he was bored after 15 minutes (nothing happens in this time)and we ended up leaving 60 minutes into the film, along with several other people that hadn't yet fallen asleep.\n\nThere is NO humour in this, completely witless drivel from the start and it amazes me this was ever made. Pointless musical moments, one dimensional 'characters', not even some basic slapstick to keep kids interested. A total waste of time that doesn't deserve to be watched by anyone. The British voice cast should be ashamed of themselves.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6341,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2010-10-07","keywords":"father daughter relationship,hero,heroine,fire,rabbit","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Animals United","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi162440473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjJiYWE5ZTctNjUyZS00YmJjLWExNjktOWRhNTgzMDgwM2RiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjJiYWE5ZTctNjUyZS00YmJjLWExNjktOWRhNTgzMDgwM2RiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Animals United"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0179479/","name":"James Corden"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000410/","name":"Stephen Fry"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0785227/","name":"Andy Serkis"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0459996/","name":"Reinhard Klooss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1637852/","name":"Holger Tappe"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002257/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0118168/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0234654/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4380835/","name":"Simon Hauschild"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1075038/","name":"Oliver Huzly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0459996/","name":"Reinhard Klooss"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
The Grey: Directed by Joe Carnahan. With Liam Neeson, Frank Grillo, Dermot Mulroney, Dallas Roberts. After their plane crashes in Alaska, six oil workers are led by a skilled huntsman to survival, but a pack of merciless wolves haunts their every step." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1601913/","name":"The Grey","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDY4MTQwMzc1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzcwNTM5Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"After their plane crashes in Alaska, six oil workers are led by a skilled huntsman to survival, but a pack of merciless wolves haunts their every step.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1601913/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kapelusznik18"},"dateCreated":"2014-05-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Call of the Wild","reviewBody":"***SPOILERS*** After their plane crashed with almost all the oil rig workers on board getting killed it was up to hunter and expert survivalist in the wild John Ottway, Liam Neeson, to get himself and the some half dozen survivors from the crash back home to civilization;Which can be as far as 500 miles away in far off Juno Alaska. It's ironic that John who was just about to blow his brains out before he bordered the plane is now responsible for saving the lives of his fellow oil workers as well as himself in the frozen wasteland of Northern Alaska.

John has already been going through a severe depression in a number of flash back scenes we've seen in the film involving his bed ridden wife Ana, Anne Openshaw, who's suffering from terminal cancer. This, the plane crash, has given John a reason for living in not only saving his life but the lives of those oil rig workers who depend on him. It soon becomes apparent that the plane crash the middle of wolf country and the wolves see him and his men as food or fresh meat needed for their survival. Not only that they also see John & Co. as being a threat to their existence in being so close to the den that they make or call, in wolf talk, their home!

***SPOILERS*** The wolves lead by a ferociously looking jet black, with blazing yellow eyes, alpha wolf start to systematically attack the men lead by John and end up killing and devouring most of them. In the snow blind conditions John together with Diaz, Frank Grillo, Burke, Nonso Anozie, and Hendrick, Dallas Roberts, make it to the tree line or forest to find both shelter as well as safety from the cold and attacking wolves. It's then that they exhausted and out of food run out of gas or strength as nature and the inhospitable environment takes it course on them. In the final scene of the movie that we see John with only a couple of broken whiskey bottles to defend himself against the wolf pack about to duke it out with the alpha wolf in a one on one, with the rest of the wolf pack on the sideline, winner take all confrontation. With all the men he's responsible for now long dead or eaten by the wolf pack a "I have nothing at all to live for" John Ottway feels win or lose this is going to be the end of the line for him anyway.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":245926,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-01-27","keywords":"snow,survival,wolf,alcohol,howling","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2672533017","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3ODEwMDM1OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzg4NzgxNw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3ODEwMDM1OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzg4NzgxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In Alaska, an oil drilling team struggle to survive after a plane crash strands them in the wild. Hunting the humans are a pack of wolves who see them as intruders."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000551/","name":"Dermot Mulroney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342029/","name":"Frank Grillo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0138620/","name":"Joe Carnahan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0342335/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0119195/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0192696/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0138620/","name":"Joe Carnahan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2259451/","name":"Ian Mackenzie Jeffers"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: We're the Millers
Obitelj Peeples
programme.desc:
We're the Millers: Directed by Rawson Marshall Thurber. With Jennifer Aniston, Jason Sudeikis, Emma Roberts, Will Poulter. A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1723121/","name":"We're the Millers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA5Njc0NDUxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjYzNzU1OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1723121/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sanjna-polamarasetty-869-692642"},"dateCreated":"2014-02-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"An actually funny comedy","reviewBody":"'We're the Millers' follows a drug dealer, a stripper, a runaway and a geek, who come together pretending to be a traditional, all American suburban family to smuggle a whole heap of drugs from Mexico into the US. Fortunately for us, Jennifer Aniston plays a stripper. With all the actors playing surprisingly likable characters, who's opposing chemistry works impeccably when put together. 

I usually find that most of the time, films that parade around claiming to be comedies, usually with one famous face to show, are often just not funny. But 'We're The Millers' was actually a good comedy; probably not in a witty sophisticated way, but it made me laugh. This film also has its emotions, in their own little unconventional ways, considering the leads were not exactly your average person. 

If I had to think of the one thing that I found extremely obnoxious, it would have to be Ed Helms. Everything about his character and his acting, was just annoying, which is probably why the ending made me quite happy. 

Worth watching if you need a no-brainer to spike your mood. And if not for the laughs, I'm sure Jennifer Aniston stripping would do the trick.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":421043,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2013-09-25","keywords":"stripper,girl in panties,wet panties,thong panties,white panties","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi544319001","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTYwMjM0NzU1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDI2ODU1OQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTYwMjM0NzU1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDI2ODU1OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0837177/","name":"Jason Sudeikis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000098/","name":"Jennifer Aniston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0731075/","name":"Emma Roberts"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1098493/","name":"Rawson Marshall Thurber"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038281/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0459878/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1462097/","name":"Bob Fisher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0264520/","name":"Steve Faber"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1890845/","name":"Sean Anders"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

Fortunately for us, Jennifer Aniston plays a stripper. With all the actors playing surprisingly likable characters, who's opposing chemistry works impeccably when put together. 

I usually find that most of the time, films that parade around claiming to be comedies, usually with one famous face to show, are often just not funny. programme.title: Escape from Planet Earth
Bijeg s planeta Zemlje
programme.desc: Escape from Planet Earth: Directed by Cal Brunker. With Brendan Fraser, Rob Corddry, Ricky Gervais, Jonathan Morgan Heit. Astronaut Scorch Supernova finds himself caught in a trap when he responds to an SOS from a notoriously dangerous alien planet." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0765446/","name":"Escape from Planet Earth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQyMTk4NjkyMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzA2OTY4OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Astronaut Scorch Supernova finds himself caught in a trap when he responds to an SOS from a notoriously dangerous alien planet.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0765446/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Ghostninja"},"dateCreated":"2013-06-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoyable, but nothing spectacular","reviewBody":"Good story, if a little bit uninspired. Some good moral points and impressive twists. As far as animations go, quality is right up there and an interesting ideas on how extra terrestrials could look. great variety in shape and sizes as well as a believable planet network. enjoyable graphics and great voice acting with a few celebs Took me forever to figure out who one of the characters were! but got there in the end. Nothing extra ordinary about it, some good takes on human way of life for the adults to chuckle at. All in all an enjoyable movie, and while its not up with the best animations i've ever seen i certainly enjoyed it and will recommend it to any kid/kid at heart who likes scifi!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":25188,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2013-02-15","keywords":"psychotronic film,b movie,movie flop,astronomical object in title,astronaut","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Version #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1950917657","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1MjQ4MjE5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDU1OTkyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1MjQ4MjE5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDU1OTkyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Astronaut Scorch Supernova finds himself caught in a trap when he responds to an SOS from a notoriously dangerous alien planet."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000409/","name":"Brendan Fraser"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000572/","name":"Sarah Jessica Parker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004695/","name":"Jessica Alba"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2117510/","name":"Cal Brunker"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003199/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0414628/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0168855/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1779809/","name":"Bob Barlen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2117510/","name":"Cal Brunker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000410/","name":"Stephen Fry"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Good People

programme.desc: Good People: Directed by Henrik Ruben Genz. With Sam Spruell, Michael Fox, Diarmaid Murtagh, Francis Magee. Discovering a stash of cash in their dead tenant's apartment, a couple in debt take the money and find themselves the target of a deadly adversary - the thief who stole it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1361318/","name":"Good People","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxOTk5ODc0Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDA3MzExMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Discovering a stash of cash in their dead tenant's apartment, a couple in debt take the money and find themselves the target of a deadly adversary - the thief who stole it.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1361318/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2015-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Does it pay to be good?","reviewBody":"And what is good anyway? Who defines what actions are good? Or if good people are not capable of doing bad things? And would that make them bad people? Don't get it twisted though: This is not a philosophical look at those things. If you even remotely asks those questions, it's not because the movie intended to make you think that much. It's your own perception that goes that extra mile (or two).\n\nThe movie moves along nicely, you can see almost everything coming your way and it's decent, if you're not annoyed by the standard formula this uses. It's nice to see another french actor making the move into "mainstream" Hollywood, even if he's not in it that much. programme.title: Scream
Vrisak
programme.desc:
Scream: Directed by Wes Craven. With Drew Barrymore, Roger Jackson, Kevin Patrick Walls, David Booth. A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of a deadly game." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0117571/","name":"Scream","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA2NjU5MTg5OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTkyMzQxMDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of a deadly game.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0117571/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bob the moo"},"dateCreated":"2002-04-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Scary, funny and clever  the best Scream movie by miles","reviewBody":"Almost a year after someone raped and killed Sidney Prescott's mother in the small town of Woodsboro, someone is killing teenagers. When Sidney herself becomes a target, the link is apparent and her missing father is a suspect. However, as with all good scary movies, everyone is a suspect.

The film that sparked the revival of horror movies (Halloween H2O, I know what you did last summer, Urban Legend etc all followed ..thanks a lot!). This stands out from all those (and it's lackluster sequels) by being really good and clever. The story is nothing more than the standard slasher plot  but it avoids the cliches quite well. In fact it uses the cliches as references and makes plenty of jokey references to other movies and the supposed rules of horror movies  we even have a quick flash of a caretaker dressed in Freddy's jumper and hat!

That doesn't mean it's not scary  it is! From the tragically horrible opening 10 minutes through each gory killing the tension is high and the shocks are real. The plot twists nicely and the ending is much better than most slasher movies (including the absurd endings of 2 and 3). This manages to be fresh, clever and scary  getting by any sticking moments with it's tongue in it's cheek.

The cats are good  Campbell is a believable virgin, scarred by what happened to her mother  before she starts turning into Buffy the vampire slayer in parts 2 and 3. Cox is excellent playing against type and David Arquette is funny as the Deputy Sheriff. Kennedy as Randy is also funny as the movie geek  in fact he remains the highlight of the next 2 films. The cast being filled of up and coming faces (including Ulrich) makes it even more thrilling when the `wrong' people get killed, technically all the cast are `unknowns' who usually make up the body count, so really anyone can potentially get offed.

Overall funny black comedy, scary thrills and gory excitement. A rare treat  a really good teen horror movie"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":300188,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"1996-12-20","keywords":"serial killer,slasher,masked killer,female protagonist,telephone call","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Scream: Blu-Ray","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1175821337","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGVhM2VmYzktZTUzOS00NmMzLWFhM2UtMThiY2I1YjRhYTQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGVhM2VmYzktZTUzOS00NmMzLWFhM2UtMThiY2I1YjRhYTQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Scream"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000117/","name":"Neve Campbell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001073/","name":"Courteney Cox"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000274/","name":"David Arquette"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000127/","name":"Wes Craven"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0055428/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0932078/","name":"Kevin Williamson"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Light Between Oceans
Svjetlo između oceana
programme.desc: The Light Between Oceans: Directed by Derek Cianfrance. With Michael Fassbender, Alicia Vikander, Rachel Weisz, Florence Clery. A lighthouse keeper and his wife living off the coast of Western Australia raise a baby they rescue from a drifting rowing boat." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2547584/","name":"The Light Between Oceans","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTI1NzQzMjgxOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTY1OTY2OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A lighthouse keeper and his wife living off the coast of Western Australia raise a baby they rescue from a drifting rowing boat.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2547584/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"christian-larson"},"dateCreated":"2016-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Amazing movie about relationship","reviewBody":"The Light Between Oceans starts Michael Fassbender, Alicia Vikander and Rachel Weisz. And its the story of a couple living in a lighthouse and in the ocean they find a baby. And that's all I am going to say since the trailer again ruined some important plot points of the film. This movie is very slow but is the kind of movie in which almost everything is on point and it never goes to a route in which derails the movie, I was pleasantly surprised! I loved this film! The cinematography is amazing with a lot of shots of the ocean and the wind, it was truly jaw-dropping. The acting was also great, Michael Fassbender as always gives a brilliant performance. But the actress who surprised me a lot is Alicia Vikander. She is fantastic as this lady who has lost a lot and has a lot of regret. She was truly Oscar-worthy. The story was great as it is not only about the relationship between Tom and Isabel, but it's also about guilt, sadness, loss, etc. The ending floured me, I absolutely loved it. The only issue I have is that Toms and Isabels relationship is a bit rushed and with no real sense of direction, and the beginning is kind-off slow but then it picks it right back up the next 5 minutes. I had a great time with this film and i would recommend it to everybody who wants to experience a heart-breaking story that is actually realistic and authentic.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54377,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2016-09-02","keywords":"lighthouse,husband wife relationship,lighthouse keeper,loss of husband,1920s","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2715005977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0NzQwMTY5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTExMDA5ODE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0NzQwMTY5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTExMDA5ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered around a lighthouse keeper and his wife who live off the coast of Western Australia. Happening upon a baby they rescue from an adrift rowboat, the couple make the life-altering decision to raise the child as their own."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1055413/","name":"Michael Fassbender"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2539953/","name":"Alicia Vikander"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001838/","name":"Rachel Weisz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0161834/","name":"Derek Cianfrance"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159772/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0553897/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0161834/","name":"Derek Cianfrance"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5390305/","name":"M.L. programme.title: Kaptein Sabeltann og den magiske diamant
Kapetan Sabljozubi i magični dijamant
programme.desc: Kaptein Sabeltann og den magiske diamant: Directed by Marit Moum Aune, Rasmus A. Sivertsen. programme.title: Paranoia
Paranoja
programme.desc:
Paranoia: Directed by Robert Luketic. With Liam Hemsworth, Gary Oldman, Amber Heard, Harrison Ford. An entry-level employee at a powerful corporation finds himself occupying a corner office, but at a dangerous price: he must spy on his boss's old mentor to secure for him a multi-billion dollar advantage." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1413495/","name":"Paranoia","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyNjYwMTYwM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDA4NTc2OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An entry-level employee at a powerful corporation finds himself occupying a corner office, but at a dangerous price: he must spy on his boss's old mentor to secure for him a multi-billion dollar advantage.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1413495/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"claudio_carvalho"},"dateCreated":"2017-11-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Flawed, Brainless but Entertaining","reviewBody":""Paranoia" is one of those films that are flawed, brainless but entertaining. The story of the ambitious twenty-seven year old Adam Cassidy with debts in the hospital for the expensive treatment of his father that in a couple of days becomes an important executive of a corporation competitor of the company that he was fired is totally absurd. He uses US$ 16,000 in the corporation card to party and what would he expect? Therefore, the tight spot that he is in is caused by a ridiculous situation. The coincidence of having one night stand with Emma Jennings is another unbelievable part of the screenplay. The unethical Adam Cassidy should have been in prison for a long period, since his lack of character and manipulation are disgusting. Emma returning to him is also incredible for an intelligent woman that was used. But forgetting these ridiculous situations, the viewer can enjoy the beauty of Amber Heard; the always great Gary Oldman and Richard Dreyfuss; see Josh "Sawyer" Holloway once again; and a good cast with Harrison Ford, Embeth Davidtz, Julian McMahon and Liam Hemsworth. Shutdown your brain and you may have a good time. My vote is seven.

programme.title: Bosch
Bosch
programme.desc: Bosch: Created by Eric Ellis Overmyer. With Titus Welliver, Jamie Hector, Amy Aquino, Lance Reddick. An L.A.P.D. homicide detective works to solve the murder of a thirteen-year-old boy while standing trial in federal court for the murder of a serial killer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3502248/","name":"Bosch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDBiYjg4OTgtZDg2YS00ZGIzLTk3ZWMtZWRlZDQ5M2I0MDNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"An L.A.P.D. homicide detective works to solve the murder of a thirteen-year-old boy while standing trial in federal court for the murder of a serial killer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3502248/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"c_l_costa"},"dateCreated":"2014-02-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"More please!","reviewBody":"As a huge fan of Michael Connelly's Bosch books, I was looking forward to seeing this pilot and I wasn't disappointed. Titus Welliver is the perfect Bosch, the rest of the cast are just as brilliant and the writing and production are both spot on. The story line is in fact two Bosch books woven into one and it has been done very cleverly. Bosch fans have been waiting for twenty years for this character to be put onto film but for me, it was worth the wait. I would dearly love to see this made into a complete series. Titus Welliver is as brilliant as always and has the tormented look behind his eyes that any Bosch fan would expect to see. He may not physically resemble Harry but that is soon forgotten. IMDb data; ttnr: 3502248, Title: Bosch, --- Description: Bosch: Created by Eric Ellis Overmyer. With Titus Welliver, Jamie Hector, Amy Aquino, Lance Reddick. An L.A.P.D. homicide detective works to solve the murder of a thirteen-year-old boy while standing trial in federal court for the murder of a serial killer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3502248/","name":"Bosch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDBiYjg4OTgtZDg2YS00ZGIzLTk3ZWMtZWRlZDQ5M2I0MDNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"An L.A.P.D. homicide detective works to solve the murder of a thirteen-year-old boy while standing trial in federal court for the murder of a serial killer.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3502248/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"c_l_costa","dateCreated":"2014-02-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"More please!","reviewBody":"As a huge fan of Michael Connelly's Bosch books, I was looking forward to seeing this pilot and I wasn't disappointed. Titus Welliver is the perfect Bosch, the rest of the cast are just as brilliant and the writing and production are both spot on. The story line is in fact two Bosch books woven into one and it has been done very cleverly. Bosch fans have been waiting for twenty years for this character to be put onto film but for me, it was worth the wait. I would dearly love to see this made into a complete series. Titus Welliver is as brilliant as always and has the tormented look behind his eyes that any Bosch fan would expect to see. He may not physically resemble Harry but that is soon forgotten. Watch, enjoy, rate and share!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":57088,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-02-06","keywords":"father daughter relationship,homicide detective,police procedural,police detective,based on novel","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0920038/","name":"Titus Welliver","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0373100/","name":"Jamie Hector","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0032628/","name":"Amy Aquino"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483993/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420833/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0319272/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0653899/","name":"Eric Ellis Overmyer"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Watch the Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3258368025","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU4MWFhMWYtMjdmNi00ZDNkLWI4NWMtNWJiNjBlYjFkMmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU4MWFhMWYtMjdmNi00ZDNkLWI4NWMtNWJiNjBlYjFkMmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Eye in the Sky
Pogled s neba
programme.desc:
Eye in the Sky: Directed by Gavin Hood. With Faisa Hassan, Aisha Takow, Armaan Haggio, Helen Mirren. Col. Katherine Powell, a military officer in command of an operation to capture terrorists in Kenya, sees her mission escalate when a girl enters the kill zone triggering an international dispute over the implications of modern warfare." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2057392/","name":"Eye in the Sky","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTY4Nzg5MTU0OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY2MjU2NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Col. Katherine Powell, a military officer in command of an operation to capture terrorists in Kenya, sees her mission escalate when a girl enters the kill zone triggering an international dispute over the implications of modern warfa","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2057392/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ahassan-12342"},"dateCreated":"2016-05-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nail-biting drama... But the film's morality is more dubious than it recognises","reviewBody":"Director Gavin Hood's previous film, the underrated Ender's Game, focused upon the increasingly virtual, high-tech surveillance and disengaged nature of modern warfare. These elements of Ender's Game are clearly visible in the director's latest thriller offering, Eye in the Sky. The story here involves disparate groups of military and political personnel scattered around the world, all watching the live stream of a terrorist compound in Nairobi and debating whether or not to fire a drone into a heavily-populated ethnically Somali suburb of the Kenyan capital.

The operation is shown to be a joint British and American backed mission and the debate revolves around the collateral damage a drone strike would cause. The collateral damage is given a human face through a young girl who has set up a bread stall near the compound. Eye in the Sky's original title was "Kill Chain" and the reasoning becomes evident as the rest of the film involves people referring up the chain of command to avoid making a decision. The running time consists mainly of people talking to each other on phones and via video screens, however Hood manages to make these scenes some of the tensest, most cinematic, Skype calls you will ever see.

Eye in the Sky highlights the "hawk" and "dove" nature of the politicians of the two countries involved, one memorable scene being the US Secretary of State angry that his game of table tennis is interrupted because the British are dithering. However, the film's demonstration of realpolitik was weaker and has been presented far more successfully in Armando Iannucci's In the Loop, a film based on the run-up to the Iraq War. The film also lacked any strong, coherent argument against the drone strike apart from the contrived little girl selling bread nearby; not touching at all on the long-term consequences of dropping a bomb on a Somali suburb. The film reduces the complicated morality of drone warfare to a simplistic choice: it's either this little girl or a terrorist attack in a busy shopping mall. There's no concern however for civilians nearby who aren't cute children, or that the potential civilian casualties from this attack could be used by Al Shabab to garner more support amongst the population.

Alan Rickman is fantastically dry in his last on-screen role as a British Lieutenant General and Aaron Paul is also very impressive, despite spending the majority of the film in a Portacabin with his finger hovering over the trigger. But while Eye in the Sky may be one of the year's most gripping thrillers, the film's morality is more dubious rather than ambiguous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":82064,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2016-04-15","keywords":"drone pilot,terrorist cell,drone strike,terrorist,collateral damage","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1137947161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkzNzYzMjc5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTM1MjA0NzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkzNzYzMjc5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTM1MjA0NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"UK-based military officer Colonel Katherine Powell is in command of a top secret drone operation to capture terrorists in Kenya. Through remote surveillance and on-the-ground intel, Powell discovers the targets are planning a suicide bombing and the mission escalates from "capture" to "kill." But as American pilot Steve Watts is about to engage, a nine-year old girl enters the kill zone, triggering an international dispute reaching the highest levels of US and British government over the moral, political, and personal implications of modern warfare."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000545/","name":"Helen Mirren"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0666739/","name":"Aaron Paul"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000614/","name":"Alan Rickman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004303/","name":"Gavin Hood"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0428838/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051618/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0796441/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0382505/","name":"Guy Hibbert"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="
